episodes.title: Was "Last Days Ministries" a cult? Former members share their story.
episodes.description:
Michael is joined by podcast hosts Sharon Madere and Tracey Phalen, former Last Days Ministries (LDM) / Keith Green cult members who are breaking the silence about the culture of authority, abuse, and control so often found in evangelical/fundamentalist spaces. Hear their stories coming into LDM, becoming indoctrinated, working with Keith and Melody Green, and how they realized and finally left the movement's cultish beliefs and practices. Look for Part 2 of this interview coming soon. 

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE IF YOU LIKE THIS VIDEO. 

To get more details about Sharon and Tracey's experiences, visit their podcast: https://www.confessionsofthecultsisters.com/

To learn more about Michael's journey, visit: https://www.spiritualbrewpub.com/
